name: 指揮法（一）
description:
1. 探討指揮之歷史沿革背景。 
2. 認識各種不同拍子與表情記號的指揮法。 
3. 瞭解各項樂器的差異性及特性，以及其演奏技巧與音色變化。 
4. 聆賞不同指揮家音樂會影音資料，從中學習其指揮技巧。

NTNU Junior Conducting Class                                                                 

Attendance Policy: Tardiness and unexcused absences affect your final grades.

1\. Lateness: 1-point deduction on final grade.

2\. Unexcused absences: 2 points deduction on final grade.

3\. Withholding the privilege of taking the finals: 3 unexcused absences.

Textbook Reading Papers Collection Policy (2000 words, 12 font, single space):

1\. Added benefit - paper assignment on textbook reading greatly enhances your English    comprehension skill.

2\. List you name & class ID number.

3\. Missing dead line will affect grades severely: 25% grade deduction per late day pass due date. 4. The paper will not be accepted pass due date 4 days.

Concert Observation Papers Guideline (2000 words, 12 font, and single space):

1\. List you name & class ID number.

2\. List the date, location, performers and composition.

3\. Your critique may include views on the performance, musicianship, interpretation, technical accuracy, intonation, tone color, rhythmic integrity, spirit, effectiveness of the conductor, responses from the player(s), comments on the composition, overall presentation of the musical message, etc.

4\. Apply the knowledge learned in class and express your own opinion and critical thinking.

5\. Missing dead line will affect grades severely: 25% grade deduction per late day pass due date. 6. The paper will not be accepted pass due date 4 days.

Semester grade breakdown on 1000% total

1\. Summery Reading Papers (3) on Chapters 1-8: 300%

2\. Concert Observation Papers (2): 100% x 2: 200%

3\. Quiz 100%

4\. Mid-term: 200% (including score reading and conducting)

5\. Final: 200% (including score reading and conducting)
